title: Business Practical Competency Enhancement: Simulation-Based Learning for Global Business Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can collaborate with culturally diverse Global Virtual Team (GVT) members to develop and execute business strategies.
Learners can analyze socio-cultural conflicts in international business simulations and propose mediation strategies.
Learners can evaluate their decision-making processes through reflective practice and derive improvement plans.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
